articles.title: Researchers observe branched flow of light for the first time - Phys.org
articles.description: A team of researchers from the Technion – Israel Institute of Technology has observed branched flow of light for the very first time. The findings are published in Nature and are featured on the cover of the July 2, 2020 issue.
